# pc-icon



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                 | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `name`   | `name`    | The identifier for the icon. This name corresponds to a specific SVG asset in the icon set. | `string` | `undefined` |
